DOC.brief_summary: A pharmacokinetic study healthy volunteer compare two formulation paracetamol fast release fast state .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Compare Two Formulations Paracetamol
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 1855yrs willing give write informed consent study BMI must within range 18.5 24.9 kg/m^2 Participant minimum weight 50 kg Participant current recurrent disease could affect action , absorption disposition study medication clinical laboratory assessment ( e.g . hepatic disorder , renal insufficiency , congestive heart failure ) Participant know suspect intolerance hypersensitivity study material Participant vegetarian Participant smoking five cigarette day
